noun.description: A member of the Institute of Charity, a Catholic religious organization founded in 1828 by Antonio Rosmini-Serbati. Also occasionally: a follower of Rosmini's philosophy..

adjective.description: Belonging or relating to, or characteristic of, Rosmini, his philosophy, or the Institute of Charity.

origin: Mid 19th century. From the name of Antonio Rosmini-Serbati, Italian priest and philosopher (beatified in 2007) + -an.
